item.title: Notes on Agents
item.description:
Some notes I took while completing Huggingface Agents Course

Agent Definition: An Agent is a system that leverages an AI model to interact with its environment in order to achieve a user-defined objective. It combines reasoning, planning, and the execution of actions, often using external tools, to fulfill tasks Agent Components (Brain and Body): The Brain (AI Model): This is where reasoning and planning occur, and it decides which Actions to take based on the situation. The Body (Capabilities and Tools): This represents everything the Agent is equipped to do, determining the scope of possible actions
